name: Furious Fighter: 3D Beat Em Up
description:
3D Fighting Game - Beat Em Up - TV Box Fighting Game - Action Battle Game

Play as a furious peasant fighting the foreign invaders to protect his village against the lawless enemies. 

Game Features: 

- Fun and addictive simple fighting gameplay

- Beautiful and Colorful 3D Characters and Levels

- Intuitive Mobile and TV Box game controls

- Dozens of fighting combos to use against your numerous opponents

- Endless unique 3D levels to explore

Furious Fighter: 3D Beat Em Up is a very fun and unique gaming experience for Fighting Mobile Game lovers.
